Package com.ae2dms.controller

Class gameController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.controller.gameController
public class gameController
extends Object
Controls the game page which shows game grid

This class delivers the functionality of loading game file, loading game objects, handling player's actions and applying all features listed in the menu

Since:
26 October 2020
Author:
Sijin WANG

  • Method Details

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame() throws IOException
      Call loadGameFile() to load file.
      Throws:
      IOException - file may not exist

    • closeGame

      public void closeGame()
      Close the game.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undo.

      Call moveBack() from GameEngine.

    • toggleMusic

      public void toggleMusic() throws LineUnavailableException, IOException, UnsupportedAudioFileException
      Play/Stop music.

      Call toggleMusic() from MusicPlayer

      Throws:
      LineUnavailableException
      IOException
      UnsupportedAudioFileException

    • toggleDebug

      public void toggleDebug()
      Start/Stop debug.

      Call toggleDebug() from GameEngine.

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel()
      Reset current level.

      Call moveFirst() from GameEngine.

    • showAbout

      public void showAbout()
      Show something about this game.

    • loadDefaultSaveFile

      public void loadDefaultSaveFile​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gameGrid) throws IOException
      Load default game file and initialize game.

      Load game file, call initializeGame(in) to initialize game, and call setEventFilter() to input key press.

      Parameters:
      primaryStage - stage that perform the game
      gameGrid - grid that show the game
      Throws:
      IOException - file may not exist

    • newDialog

      public void newDialog​(String dialogTitle, String dialogMessage, javafx.scene.effect.Effect dialogMessageEffect, int height)
      Create a new stage.
      Parameters:
      dialogTitle - the title of the stage
      dialogMessage - the message on the stage
      dialogMessageEffect - the effect of the message
      height - the height of the stage

    • showRank

      public void showRank() throws IOException
      Show rank after completing each level
      Throws:
      IOException

    • Reverse

      public void Reverse()
      Open/Close reverse move state (Additional feature).

      Call isReverse() from GameEngine. Player can switch to reverse move state.

    • isLoad

      public boolean isLoad()
      Get isLoad.

      isLoad demonstrate whether player has loaded his/her own game file.

      Returns:
      isLoad

    • getGameEngine

      public static GameEngine getGameEngine()
      Get current game engine.
      Returns:
      gameEngine

      Show all the achievements player has got.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - mouse click
      Throws:
      IOException

    • isAchieveUndo
